3 #include <cmath>

5 #include <sensor_msgs/PointCloud2.h>
6 #include <sensor_msgs/point_cloud2_iterator.h>

8 namespace twizy_webots {
9 
10 Velodyne::Velodyne(webots::Supervisor &supervisor, ros::NodeHandle &nh)
11  : lidar_(supervisor.getLidar("lidar_vlp16_webots")) {
12 
13  std::cout << "Initializing Velodyne VLP16 LiDAR\n";
14 
15  double ups = 20.0;
16 
17  lidar_->enable(round(1000.0 / ups));
18  lidar_->enablePointCloud();
19 
20  publisher_ = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("/lidar/points", 1);
21 
22  update_timer_ =
23  nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(1.0 / ups), &Velodyne::update, this);
24 }
25 
26 void Velodyne::update(const ros::TimerEvent &evt) {
27  const WbLidarPoint *pc = lidar_->getPointCloud();
28  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 points;
29  points.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
30  points.header.frame_id = "lidar_vlp16_webots";
31  points.height = 1;
32  points.width = lidar_->getNumberOfPoints();
33  points.is_dense = false;
34  points.is_bigendian = false;
35  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Modifier pcd_modifier(points);
36  pcd_modifier.setPointCloud2FieldsByString(1, "xyz");
37 
38  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_x(points, "x");
39  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_y(points, "y");
40  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_z(points, "z");
41  double last_distance = 1.0;
42  int valid_points = 0;
43  for (int i = 0; i < points.width; i++) {
44  if (std::isfinite(pc[i].x)) {
45  double distance = abs(pc[i].x) + abs(pc[i].y) + abs(pc[i].z);
46  double ratio = distance / last_distance;
47  if (ratio > 0.99 && ratio < 1.01) {
48  *iter_x = pc[i].x;
49  *iter_y = pc[i].y;
50  *iter_z = pc[i].z;
51 
52  ++iter_x;
53  ++iter_y;
54  ++iter_z;
55 
56  valid_points++;
57  }
58  last_distance = distance + 1e-3;
59  }
60  }
61 
62  points.width = valid_points;
63  pcd_modifier.resize(valid_points);
64 
65  publisher_.publish(points);
66 }
67 
68 Velodyne::~Velodyne() { lidar_.reset(); }
69 
70 } // namespace twizy_webots
